subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Even the American player Paul Stastny, whose family is Slovakian, mourned the absence of Pavol Demitra from the first Olympics since his death in 2011.
snippet: Even the American player Paul Stastny, whose family is Slovakian, mourned the absence of Pavol Demitra from the first Olympics since his death in 2011.
